levels.text: yesterday, on the otherhand was a wild and marvelous adventure

levels.text: it was the sumer of 1997, and @duhHaker was working on a irc trolling bot

levels.text: my krew left town for a day of hiking, but a wrong turn took us to an unexpected nowhere land

levels.text: gurrgling, burrbling, fiercly churing; stomach groans
